description.value: Most spellcasters struggle to weave even two energies in careful ritual. You've learned to blend them in the chaos of combat

system.benefits:
When using Pneuma Strike, you can spend 4 Energy (instead of 2) to channel two elements simultaneously:

  • Make weaving checks for BOTH elements
  • Count total successes across both checks
    • 3-4 total successes: Deal +[[/damage 3d8]] damage, choose damage type or split
    • 1-2 total successes: Deal +[[/damage 2d8]] damage, choose damage type or split
    • 0 successes: Deal +1d8, choose type
